channel.title: Npc help
channel.description:
Hello, i was wondering because on my server we have two owners, and theres an npc that says if one of the owners is online. But i was wondering how i could create an npc myself that said if i was online. So basically what im asking for is all the codes i need for the npc, and where exactly to put the codes at. My name on the server is Owner Maxim
Thanks
- Maxim

item.title: Npc help
item.dc:creator: @New_owner New_owner
item.description:
@New_owner wrote:

in npchandler.java, copy the one that says that owner is online and change it to your name and also change the npc that says it, hope i helped

Read full topic
